author.bio: WPCampus is a community of web professionals, educators, and others dedicated to the growth of WordPress in higher education. Our mission is to advance colleges and universities by providing a support structure and wealth of knowledge for anyone who uses, or is interested in using, WordPress.

wordpressPost.title: Meet the Undergraduate Sponsors of WPCampus 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Our thanks to ACF, DragonTeach, elearningfreak, Happy Prime, LearnDash, Pgogy Webstuff, Platform.sh, and SMILE for supporting WPCampus 2019.
wordpressPost.content:
This post is part of a series featuring sponsors from the WPCampus 2019 conference. This event would not be possible without the support of these amazing organizations. Be sure to check out their services.

Use the Advanced Custom Fields plugin to take full control of your WordPress edit screens and custom field data. Add fields on demand: Our field builder allows you to quickly and easily add fields to WP edit screens. Add them anywhere: Fields can be added to posts, users, taxonomy terms, media, comments and even custom options pages. Show them everywhere: Load and display your custom field values in any theme template file.

DragonTeach by Wiley Solutions is an application designed to help instructors teach students WordPress. With built-in hosting and student administration, as well as automatic marking for assignments and projects, it helps instructors spend less time grading and more time with students helping them succeed.

elearningfreak has been helping instructional designers, universities and businesses get their e-learning content into WordPress since 2011. Upload any tool’s content and even custom content including Articulate Storyline, Rise, Studio, Adobe Captivate, iSpring, Gomo, Elucidat and more. Your content will look great no matter the content, theme or device.  Works with any WordPress page builder/editor!

Happy Prime is a web agency and strategic partner. We work with organizations in higher education, non-profits, and enterprises to help achieve their goals. Happy Prime contributes to open source and participates with the open source community. We believe an open and accessible web is beneficial to everyone. We want to do good work with good people. We want to do interesting work with interesting people. We are alert and available.

LearnDash is the most trusted WordPress-based learning management system (LMS) for higher education. Used by institutions like the University of Michigan (case study), Johns Hopkins University, and the University of Washington to deliver impressive online educational experiences.

Penguins! Capitalism! What do you mean brand keywords? At Pgogy Webstuff, we’ve worked with 40 percent of the world’s top ten universities. So given how bad our marketing is, imagine how good our code must be. Well don’t imagine. Just come say hello sometime and talk about how we can work together.

Platform.sh is a Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) that develops and delivers applications in multiple languages and frameworks across multiple clouds. We take care of your infrastructure—from hosting and technology to global deployment, enterprise-grade SLAs and 24×7 expert support. So you can focus on building cool, new features and apps—faster.

SMILE helps educational organisations become more authentic, timely, and personalised with a suite of creative services and digital products.

WPCampus 2019 takes place July 25-29, 2019, on the campus of Lewis and Clark College in Portland, Oregon. It’s three days filled with sessions, workshops, networking, and social events—all focused on using WordPress in higher education.

Can’t make it to the event? Check out the 2019 watch page to livestream sessions.

meta.description: Our thanks to ACF, DragonTeach, elearningfreak, Happy Prime, LearnDash, Pgogy Webstuff, Platform.sh, and SMILE for supporting WPCampus 2019.
